FDescription.English: Display the Sentry Type (<color=orange>Sniper</color>, <color=orange>Burst</color>, <color=orange>Auto</color>, <color=orange>Shotgun</color>) for remote players instead of the nondescript "<color=orange>Sentry Gun</color>" on the map screen.
FDescription.Chinese: 在地图屏幕上显示远程玩家的炮台类型(<color=orange>狙击</color>, <color=orange>连发</color>, <color=orange>自动</color>, <color=orange>霰弹</color>) 而不是普通的 "<color=orange>哨戒炮台</color>"
